channel.title: Classic thoughts from Anala
channel.description: Recent content on Classic thoughts from Anala

item.title: On starting a blog
item.description: I spent a weekend building this static website that could host simple markdown documents or HTML outputs. I am generally more interested in ensuring something is executable than maintaining the resulting product.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please e-mail me at anala.gossai@gmail.com. I am also present on LinkedIn.
